column2: After year Ruling over The Polish in Galicia, its now time to integrate it into the empire!.

The Hungarian Crown has been a decentralized state for a long time, the Hungarian nobles seems unsatisfied with their position in our empire, therefore we decided to strike the nobles who are agains't the empire in Hungrary and unite once and for all the empire.*IF TAKE THAT DECISION CANT GO FOR SGF*.
With our country finally united under one banner, now we togheter can walk into a new era!
The Romanians are a part of our empire too, they should have their citizenship and their rights!

With the union of the South German countries, there is still one who hasn't accepted joining us but should be a part of our glorious fedaration, therefore if they wont join by itself, we will force them.
The Swiss people will now be integrated into our federation, now all the south germans will be only one!.
The federation shall now unite with the shadow kingdom!.
